meta.content: Imagine Coolidge Elementary is a Kindergarten - 5th Grade highly performing school located in Coolidge, AZ, that focuses on building character and academic proficiency.

div.p:
At Imagine Coolidge we provide a safe, welcoming learning
environment. We embrace and develop children in their unique
intellectual, social, and emotional capabilities.
